name: MeridianSchoolDistrictNewsFlashBriefing
0:
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: Welcome back message to the families of Meridian School District. It includes our priorities for the school year. Safety protocols for the school year. It also includes ways to stay connected to the school.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
